00002  * jcom.equals (previously names tl.s==)
00003  * External for Jamoma: logical comparison of symbols

00010 
00011 #include "ext.h"
00012 
00013 typedef struct symbEqual
00014 {
00015         t_object                ob;     
00016         long                    rightSymbol;
00017         long                    leftSymbol;
00018         void                    *proxy;                 // pointers to proxy inlet
00019         void                    *out;                   // pointer to outlet
00020 } t_symbEqual;
00021 
00022 // Prototypes
00023 void symbEqual_anything(t_symbEqual *x, Symbol *s, short ac, Atom *av);
00024 void symbEqual_assist(t_symbEqual *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);
00025 void *symbEqual_new(Symbol *s);
00026 void symbEqual_free(t_symbEqual *x);
00027 
00028 // Globals
00029 void *symbEqual_class;
00030 
00031 
00032 /************************************************************************************/
00033 // Main() Function
00034 
00035 int main(void)
00036 {
00037     setup((t_messlist **)&symbEqual_class, (method)symbEqual_new, (method)symbEqual_free,(short)sizeof(t_symbEqual), 0L, A_DEFSYM, 0);                          
00038         addmess((method)symbEqual_assist,               "assist",               A_CANT,0);
00039         addmess((method)symbEqual_anything,             "anything",             A_GIMME,0);
00040         return 0;
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 /************************************************************************************/
00045 // Object Life
00046 
00047 void *symbEqual_new(Symbol *s)
00048 {
00049         t_symbEqual *x = (t_symbEqual *)newobject(symbEqual_class);
00050         x->rightSymbol = (long)s;                       //Initialize
00051         x->proxy = proxy_new(x, 1, 0L);         //Create 2nd inlet
00052         x->out = intout(x);                                     //Create int outlet
00053         return (x);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void symbEqual_free(t_symbEqual *x)
00057 {
00058         freeobject((t_object *)(x->proxy));
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 /************************************************************************************/
00063 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00064 
00065 // Method for Assistance Messages
00066 void symbEqual_assist(t_symbEqual *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)   // Display assistance messages
00067 {
00068         if(msg==1){ 
00069                 switch(arg){
00070                         case 0: sprintf(dst, "Symbol: Compared to stored symbol"); break;
00071                         case 1: sprintf(dst, "Symbol: Stored to be compared with left inlet"); break;
00072                 }       
00073         }
00074         else if(msg==2)
00075                 sprintf(dst, "1=true, 0=false");
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 // Receive symbols in any inlet
00080 void symbEqual_anything(t_symbEqual *x, Symbol *s, short ac, Atom *av)
00081 {
00082         long    flag;
00083         long    inlet = proxy_getinlet((t_object *)x);
00084         
00085         if(inlet == 1)
00086                 x->rightSymbol = (long)s;
00087         else{
00088                 x->leftSymbol = (long)s;
00089                 flag = (x->leftSymbol == x->rightSymbol);
00090                 outlet_int(x->out, flag);
00091         }
00092 }
